p: Different case reports have described the use of MQ by itself in HIV-positive PML patients, sometimes with repression of JCPyV replication [ 122, 123, 124, 125] and rarely with the death of the patient [ 126]. The combined treatment MQ and mirtazapine was administered to HIV-positive patients, leading to a failure because of premature death and not always due to the PML itself [ 127, 128].
